messages.subject: Lecture - Samurai Arts from the Collector's Viewpoint
messages.msgSnippet: Lecture - Samurai Arts from the Collector s Viewpoint At Pacific Asia Museum RICHARD SURAN, a member of the museum s Japanese Arts Council and knowledgeable
messages.messageBody:
Lecture - Samurai Arts from the Collector's Viewpoint
At Pacific Asia Museum

RICHARD SURAN, a member of the museum's Japanese Arts Council and
knowledgeable collector of Japanese samurai arts will offer an
insider's view of a fascinating topic.


* * *

To keep up with Asia-related events in Southern California, visit
the calendar section of the Asia Institute website. If you would
like to receive a weekly email newsletter listing Asia-focused
events, please send your name and email address to
asia@...


Date: Saturday, June 04, 2005

Time: 1:30 PM - 2:30 PM

Pacific Asia Museum
46 N. Los Robles Ave
Pasadena, CA 91101


Cost: free

Tel: (626) 449-2742, ext. 31
www.pacificasiamuseum.org
